attributes.action: not support Tony Blair but instead, support Terry Wogan for European President because he will soon need the readies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should not support Tony Blair for President of Europe because he is some sort of  tax exile from Jerusalem. Instead, Terry Wogan is completely qualified for the Very Important Post of President of the Very Important European Council. He's done Eurovision, and he sang 'The Floral Dance'. When he bought up every copy and sent it to the Afghan war, it caused a fifth of the Taliban to surrender immediately. He alone should be our President!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
